title:
Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit with Presentation Cradle and USB Kit, Black,
Compatible Devices: Laptop, Desktop, Power Source: Corded Electric, Usb Cable, 3 AAA batteries required.
descriptions:
**Boost Efficiency with the ZEBRA Cordless Handheld Imager Kit**

Take your business to the next level with the ZEBRA Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit. This innovative solution is designed to streamline your workflow, providing unparalleled scanning performance and convenience.

**Key Features:**

- **Ergonomic Design**: The lightweight and handheld design ensures comfortable use, reducing fatigue and increasing productivity.
- **Omni-Directional Scanning**: Scan barcodes from any angle with ease, saving time and effort.
- **Pre-Configured and Plug-and-Play**: Get started right away with the pre-configured settings and auto-host cables.
- **Long-Lasting Battery Life**: Powered by 3 AAA batteries, this imager kit provides reliable performance on the go.
- **Cordless Freedom**: Enjoy the flexibility of cordless scanning, perfect for retail and hospitality environments.

**Perfect for:**

- Retail stores
- Hospitality businesses
- General-purpose applications

**Kit Includes:**

- Cordless Handheld Imager
- Presentation Cradle
- USB Kit

**Upgrade Your Scanning Experience Today**

Experience the power and convenience of the ZEBRA Cordless Handheld Imager Kit. Order now and discover a more efficient way to scan and manage your inventory.
